title: Plat 4 Mid/Top Main LF Clash Team
body:
Most confident in Mid or Top but I can flex to Sup or Bot. Looking for a team to play on both Sat and Sunday with.

Add “Fayra” in game.

replies.body: we need a mid/top as well so either will be fine. i sent u an invite if you are keen

yo 
we need a mid for clash
